rules.text1: Welcome in the Memory of Superheroes !
rules.text2: The purpose of the game is simple :
rules.text3: return all the cards on the board, by finding all the matching pairs of the superheroes logos.
rules.text4: You can return 2 cards by turn : if they match, they stay visible otherwise they go back to their hidden part !
rules.text5: You will have to memorize their position to remember where they are, if you return the other card matching.
rules.text6: If you find the 12 pairs before the end of the time allocated, you win !
rules.text7: Be careful : the chronometer starts when you press Play. Good luck !
